Core Plot (Mac OS)
Cocoa plotting framework for Mac OS X and iOS

Properties
Pie Chart
Plots
Collaboration diagram for Pie Chart:

Properties

CGFloat CPTPieChart::pieRadius
 The radius of the overall pie chart. Defaults to 80% of the initial frame size.
CGFloat CPTPieChart::pieInnerRadius
 The inner radius of the pie chart, used to create a "donut hole". Defaults to 0.
CGFloat CPTPieChart::startAngle
 The starting angle for the first slice in radians. Defaults to pi/2.
CGPoint CPTPieChart::centerAnchor
 The position of the center of the pie chart with the x and y coordinates given as a fraction of the width and height, respectively. Defaults to (0.5, 0.5).
